plot: Shkurta and her father are the only ones to survive the war. Now they struggle to survive the new reality - Shkurta tries to hold on to what's left and her father adjusts to life without a son.
title: Shkurta
plot_es: Shkurta and her father are the only ones to survive the war. Now they struggle to survive the new reality - Shkurta tries to hold on to what's left and her father adjusts to life without a son.
plot_en: Shkurta and her father are the only ones to survive the war. Now they struggle to survive the new reality - Shkurta tries to hold on to what's left and her father adjusts to life without a son.
